sentences.en: Molten iron containing excessive oxygen, hydrogen and nitrogen would promote the blowhole to form.
sentences.cn: 铁液含有过量的氧 、 氢、氮都能促使铸件产生气孔缺陷.

sentences.en: The actual facts showed that they are effective in blowhole formed.
sentences.cn: 实践表明,该焊接气孔防止措施应用效果良好,能够提高焊接质量.

sentences.en: The hydrogel is one kind of package watery solid, has the extremely thin blowhole.
sentences.cn: 水凝胶是一种包含水的固体, 有极细的气孔.

sentences.en: The main defect of type YC 4112 Q cylinder head is blowhole.
sentences.cn: 气孔为YC4112Q气缸盖的主要缺陷.

sentences.en: The real nose however is the blowhole on top of the head.
sentences.cn: 而真正的鼻孔其实是它们头顶的喷水孔。

sentences.en: The whale expelled water from his blowhole.
There are defects such as wash, blowhole, dispersed shrinkage in the butterfly type valve.
sentences.cn: 蝶阀体铸件存在冲砂 、 气孔 、 缩孔等缺陷.

sentences.en: They make these sounds by rapidly opening and closing their blowhole.
sentences.cn: 它们用快速开闭气孔的方式来发出这些声音.

sentences.en: To avoid drowning during sleep, it is crucial that marine mammals retain control of their blowhole.
sentences.cn: 为避免在睡眠时溺水, 海洋哺乳动物保持对呼吸孔的控制至关重要.

sentences.en: To spout moist air from the blowhole . Used of a whale.
sentences.cn: 如一些哺乳动物(鲸等)一样从呼吸孔中喷出的潮湿的气.

words.tran_cn: （鲸、海豚等的）喷水孔；（隧道等的）通风孔；[岩]岩石孔穴；[材]气泡

trans.tran_cn: （鲸头顶的）呼吸孔，（供海豹等呼吸的）冰窟窿，铸孔
